KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Character compareEQ 010
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareNE compareGT compareGE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareEQ function to compare two objects and return the Boolean value, true or false. The values of each objects are compared to determine whether the objects are equal or not. The Integer argument is converted into Character values.

Syntax.Note: The character, a, has an ASCII value of 97
